pages.text:
Block shapes such as stairs, slabs, fences, etc cannot be crafted, and are instead available through the $(concept)Variant Selector/$.

Hold $(k:quark.keybind.variant_selector) to bring up the selector radial, and then use the mouse to select a variant.

Hold $(k:key.sneak) over an item to preview its variants.
The $(concept)Variant Selector/$ as it appears in game.
